scripts.test:all: yarn test:esm && yarn test:cjs && yarn test:mts && yarn test:deno
scripts.test:esm: yarn generate --target esm --output-dir test/esm/edgeql-js && cd test/esm && node test.js
scripts.test:cjs: yarn generate --target cjs --output-dir test/cjs/edgeql-js && cd test/cjs && node test.js
scripts.test:mts: yarn generate --target mts --output-dir test/mts/edgeql-js && cd test/mts && yarn build && node dist/test.js
scripts.test:deno: cd test/deno && deno task generate && deno task play
